description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Milan, Italy. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Modern Milan Elegance near Historic City Centre with Daily Breakfast & EUR50 Dining Credit
hotels.description: Located close to Milan's historic centre and a stone's throw from the upscale CityLife district, this modern hotel invites you to explore The Fashion Capital from a luxurious base. Just steps from the Lotto Metro Station, the hotel offers convenient access to the city's iconic landmarks, including the Duomo di Milano and the Basilica of Santa Maria delle Grazie, home to Da Vinci's 'The Last Supper'. Start or end your days at MaMì Restaurant, a contemporary take on Milanese cuisine with a lavish breakfast buffet and stunning cocktails by the hotels' own daring cocktail masters. For a midday pause, Elyxr Café delivers the espresso Milan deserves.

hotels.title: Stylish Milan Hotel in Italian Fashion Capital
hotels.description: Fall in love with the voco Milan-Fiere, an IHG Hotel, a stylish and vibrant escape in the heart of Italy's fashion capital. Savour sumptuous dishes at OnFire Grill and Lounge, let your hair down at Ludico bar and gaming area for some cool competition and cooler cocktails or revitalise after a long soak in the Turkish baths at the wellness centre. As the sun sets, retire to a cosy and welcoming room for a good night's sleep or hit the streets of Milan to experience the dynamic nightlife.

hotels.title: Elegant Escape in the Heart of Milan
hotels.description: Experience world-class luxury from Italy’s ultimate fashion runway, with a stay in the boutique Hotel Indigo Milan - Corso Monforte, an IHG Hotel. Set in a prestigious 19th-century building, this hotel is a historic masterpiece in architectural and interior design. Lose yourself in the beauty of the city as you live out the perfect European fantasy, wandering ancient cobblestone streets, indulging in luxurious high-end shopping, and gazing upon magnificent historic monuments.

hotels.title: Elegant Milan Retreat within Italy's Fashion Capital
hotels.description: Live your Italian dream and step into a world of fashion, culture and gourmet cuisine at Crowne Plaza Milan - Linate, an IHG Hotel. A fast-paced metropolis home to some of the world's most influential fashion houses, Milan allows you to indulge in opulent retail therapy, dine in Michelin-starred restaurants and wander through amazing sights that encapsulate the city's rich history. Shop 'til you drop, then return to the hotel and sip mouthwatering Italian wines at the onsite Il Giardino restaurant.

hotels.title: Sophisticated Fashion Capital Escape in the Heart of Milan
hotels.description: Find yourself in the heart of the fashion capital with an escape to the sophisticated Crowne Plaza Milan City, an IHG Hotel. Positioned in the heart of this thriving Italian metropolis, you'll have food, fashion and culture at your fingertips. Positioned just steps from Milano Centrale Railway Station, use this hotel as your launchpad for discovering the cobblestone streets, Michelin Star restaurants and art that encapsulates this city's beauty.

hotels.title: Boutique Milan Designer Suites in Renowned Navigli District
hotels.description: Experience high-end opulence and refreshing indulgence at the boutique Aethos Milan. Ideally located in the heart of Milan, within walking distance of the Columns of St. Lawrence, Arco di Porta Ticinese and Navigli Milano, Aethos Milan offers an eclectic mix of artistic elegance and modern comforts, while maintaining impeccable hospitality and authentic Italian style. Each of its picturesque suites offers an industrial aesthetic softened by swathes of warm orange and yellow and handpicked design features. Inside, guests can whet their appetite with tantalizing classic Italian flavors at ZAÏA Restaurant, or settle in with a reinvented cocktail at The Doping Bar - known for its dynamic menu featuring local herbs, botanicals and homemade spirits. Once you've had your fill, hit the city streets and visit the iconic sites nearby, or hop on a train at Milano Centrale Railway Station to explore further afield.
